head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HEBERDEN, DORIS ROSE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HEBERDEN, DORIS ROSE

block.p: HEBERDEN-Doris Rose. Age 92, of Mt. Holly, NJ. Formerly of Lowell, NY. On July 13, 2000. Survived by sister Nancy Smith of Mt. Holly; niece Sheila Avruch of Fairfax, VA; nephew Richard Smith of Springfield Twp., NJ. Funeral services Friday, 12 noon at Perinchief Chapels, 438 High St., Mt. Holly, NJ. Interment in Lakeview Memorial Park will be private. Calling 11am-12pm at the funeral home.
